title: How Many Calories in a PB Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a PB sandwich, including protein, fats, carbs, and tweaks for variations like adding jelly.
h1: How Many Calories in a PB Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard PB sandwich: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, no jelly or added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, peanut butter brand, portion size, and additions like jelly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB sandwich has about 350 kcal and 13 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a PB sandwich with jelly?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for a standard version with 1 tbsp jelly added.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g protein from the peanut butter and bread.

faqs.q: Does bread type affect calories in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”whole wheat may lower it slightly to ~330 kcal versus white bread.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a PB sandwich?
faqs.a: Around 18 g total fat, mostly healthy unsaturated from peanut butter.

faqs.q: Are PB sandwiches high in sodium?
faqs.a: Moderately, about 450 mg due to bread and salted peanut butter.
